very good quality , very annoying "sample" in the left uppercorner

Wow, thanks so much for this, have been waiting for it for ages. The quality is good, I don't mind the 'SAMPLE' text in the corner. However, the subtitles that come with this .mkv are terrible, so you should really download the one in stygzy's link.

I couldn't fix the subtitles being misstimed even with switching players and what subtitle file I used. But I figured out how to fix it in VLC, just use the G and H hotkeys to change the subtitle delay.
thanks for torrent, but worst translation i didnt saw...
